attributes.additional_details:
1 Safer selling of cannabis (with balanced THC & CBS levels
2 Eliminate users having to deal with criminals, who push the selling of harder, more potent and dangerous drugs
3 Remove stigma of those who turn to drugs due to depression/mental issues
4. Heavy taxation to put back into local communities
5. Reduce gang-related crime and stop unfair charges to those from underprivileged backgrounds 
6. Educate users when visit dispensary’s of safe ways to use cannabis, and when it becomes a problem
attributes.background:
Create dispensary’s across UK selling cannabis to users who are 18 or over.

Cannabis grown & regulated by trained professionals; allowing users to buy cannabis in a safe environment away from criminals with a heavily monitored product.

Educate users on safe use and early warning signs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598861
